blocks.content: Topologies are connected when only ` (/) ` and ` U. j ` are both open and closed. (Contributed by FL, 17-Nov-2008.)

blocks.name: isconn
blocks.content: The predicate ` J ` is a connected topology . (Contributed by FL, 17-Nov-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm isconn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cconn), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0)), cpr(emptycls, c1))))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cconn, ctop, wceq(cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0)), cpr(emptycls, c1)), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, cv(hs0))), cpr(emptycls, cuni(cv(hs0)))))
  eqeq12d(cin(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, cv(hs0))), cpr(emptycls, cuni(cv(hs0))), cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0)), cpr(emptycls, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  ineq12d(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(ccld, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ccld)
  preq2d(emptycls, cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  df-conn(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0)), cpr(emptycls, c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isconn(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Conn ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))= { ‚àÖ, c1 }))
  ‚ä£ c1 = ‚ãÉ c0
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cconn, ctop, (c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))= { ‚àÖ, c1 }, (hs0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` hs0))= { ‚àÖ, ‚ãÉ hs0 })
  eqeq12d((hs0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` hs0)), { ‚àÖ, ‚ãÉ hs0 }, (c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0)), { ‚àÖ, c1 }, hs0 = c0)
  ineq12d(hs0, (Clsd ` hs0), c0, (Clsd ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, ccld)
  preq2d(emptycls, ‚ãÉ hs0, c1, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr(‚ãÉ hs0, c1, ‚ãÉ c0, hs0 = c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  df-conn(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))= { ‚àÖ, c1 })
}

blocks.name: isconn2
blocks.content: The predicate ` J ` is a connected topology . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isconn2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cconn), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0)), cpr(emptycls, c1))))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cconn), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0)), cpr(emptycls, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0)), cpr(emptycls, c1))))
  isconn(c0, c1)
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0)), cpr(emptycls, c1)), wss(cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0)), cpr(emptycls, c1)))
  syl6rbbr(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0)), cpr(emptycls, c1)), wss(cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0)), cpr(emptycls, c1)), wa(wss(cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0)), cpr(emptycls, c1)), wss(cpr(emptycls, c1), cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0)))))
  biantrud(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0)), cpr(emptycls, c1)), wss(cpr(emptycls, c1), cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0))))
  prssd(emptycls, c1, cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0)), wcel(c0, ctop))
  elind(emptycls, c0, cfv(ccld, c0), wcel(c0, ctop))
  0opn(c0)
  0cld(c0)
  elind(c1, c0, cfv(ccld, c0), wcel(c0, ctop))
  topopn(c0, c1)
  topcld(c0, c1)
  eqss(cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0)), cpr(emptycls, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isconn2(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Conn ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))‚äÜ { ‚àÖ, c1 }))
  ‚ä£ c1 = ‚ãÉ c0
} = {
  bitri(c0 ‚àà Conn, (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))‚äÜ { ‚àÖ, c1 }), (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))= { ‚àÖ, c1 }))
  isconn(c0, c1)
  pm5.32i(c0 ‚àà Top, (c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))= { ‚àÖ, c1 }, (c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))‚äÜ { ‚àÖ, c1 })
  syl6rbbr(c0 ‚àà Top, (c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))= { ‚àÖ, c1 }, (c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))‚äÜ { ‚àÖ, c1 }, ((c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))‚äÜ { ‚àÖ, c1 } ‚àß { ‚àÖ, c1 } ‚äÜ(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))))
  biantrud(c0 ‚àà Top, (c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))‚äÜ { ‚àÖ, c1 }, { ‚àÖ, c1 } ‚äÜ(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0)))
  prssd(emptycls, c1, (c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0)), c0 ‚àà Top)
  elind(emptycls, c0, (Clsd ` c0), c0 ‚àà Top)
  0opn(c0)
  0cld(c0)
  elind(c1, c0, (Clsd ` c0), c0 ‚àà Top)
  topopn(c0, c1)
  topcld(c0, c1)
  eqss((c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0)), { ‚àÖ, c1 })
}

blocks.name: connclo
blocks.content: The only nonempty clopen set of a connected topology is the whole space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm connclo(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cconn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c2)))
} = {
  mpd(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wn(wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  neneqd(c0, emptycls, w0)
  ord(w0, wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, c1))
  syl(w0, wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, cpr(emptycls, c1)))
  eleqtrd(c0, cpr(emptycls, c1), cin(c2, cfv(ccld, c2)), w0)
  elind(c0, c2, cfv(ccld, c2), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cin(c2, cfv(ccld, c2)), cpr(emptycls, c1)), wcel(c2, cconn))
  simprbi(wcel(c2, cconn), wceq(cin(c2, cfv(ccld, c2)), cpr(emptycls, c1)), wcel(c2, ctop))
  isconn(c2, c1)
  elpri(c0, emptycls, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm connclo(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 = c1)
  ‚ä£ c1 = ‚ãÉ c2
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà Conn)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(Clsd ` c2))
} = {
  mpd(w0, c0 = c1, ¬¨ c0 = ‚àÖ)
  neneqd(c0, emptycls, w0)
  ord(w0, c0 = ‚àÖ, c0 = c1)
  syl(w0, (c0 = ‚àÖ ‚à® c0 = c1), c0 ‚àà { ‚àÖ, c1 })
  eleqtrd(c0, { ‚àÖ, c1 }, (c2 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c2)), w0)
  elind(c0, c2, (Clsd ` c2), w0)
  syl(w0, (c2 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c2))= { ‚àÖ, c1 }, c2 ‚àà Conn)
  simprbi(c2 ‚àà Conn, (c2 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c2))= { ‚àÖ, c1 }, c2 ‚àà Top)
  isconn(c2, c1)
  elpri(c0, emptycls, c1)
}

blocks.name: conndisj
blocks.content: If a topology is connected, its underlying set can't be partitioned into two nonempty non-overlapping open sets. (Contributed by FL, 16-Nov-2008.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm conndisj(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wne(cun(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cconn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c1, emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls))
} = {
  mpd(w0, wne(cun(c0, c1), c2), wne(c0, emptycls))
  necon3d(c0, emptycls, cun(c0, c1), c2, w0)
  sylbid(w0, wceq(cun(c0, c1), c2), wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(cdif(c2, c0), c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(cun(c0, c1), c2), wceq(cdif(c2, c0), c1)), wss(c0, c2), wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls))
  uneqdifeq(c0, c2, c1)
  ex(w0, wceq(cdif(c2, c0), c1), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  3eqtr3d(c0, emptycls, cdif(c2, cdif(c2, c0)), cdif(c2, c1), wa(w0, wceq(cdif(c2, c0), c1)))
  difeq2d(c2, cdif(c2, c0), c1, wa(w0, wceq(cdif(c2, c0), c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cdif(c2, c0), c1), wceq(cdif(c2, cdif(c2, c0)), c0))
  sylib(w0, wceq(cdif(c2, cdif(c2, c0)), c0), wss(c0, c2))
  syl6sseqr(c0, c2, cuni(c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c0, cuni(c3)), wcel(c0, c3))
  elssuni(c0, c3)
  dfss4(c0, c2)
  syl6eq(cdif(c2, c1), emptycls, cdif(c2, c2), wa(w0, wceq(cdif(c2, c0), c1)))
  difeq2d(c2, c1, c2, wa(w0, wceq(cdif(c2, c0), c1)))
  connclo(c1, c2, c3, wa(w0, wceq(cdif(c2, c0), c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cdif(c2, c0), c1), wcel(c3, cconn))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cdif(c2, c0), c1), wcel(c1, c3))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cdif(c2, c0), c1), wne(c1, emptycls))
  eqeltrrd(c1, cfv(ccld, c3), cdif(c2, c0), wa(w0, wceq(cdif(c2, c0), c1)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cdif(c2, c0), c1))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cdif(c2, c0), c1), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), cfv(ccld, c3)))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cdif(c2, c0), cfv(ccld, c3)), wcel(c3, ctop), wcel(c0, c3))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, ctop), wcel(c3, cconn))
  simplbi(wcel(c3, cconn), wcel(c3, ctop), wceq(cin(c3, cfv(ccld, c3)), cpr(emptycls, c2)))
  isconn(c3, c2)
  opncld(c3, c0, c2)
  difid(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm conndisj(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚â† c2)
  ‚ä£ c2 = ‚ãÉ c3
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà Conn)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ)
} = {
  mpd(w0, (c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚â† c2, c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  necon3d(c0, emptycls, (c0 ‚ãÉ c1), c2, w0)
  sylbid(w0, (c0 ‚ãÉ c1)= c2, c0 = ‚àÖ, (c2 \ c0)= c1)
  syl2anc(w0, ((c0 ‚ãÉ c1)= c2 ‚Üî(c2 \ c0)= c1), c0 ‚äÜ c2, (c0 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ)
  uneqdifeq(c0, c2, c1)
  ex(w0, (c2 \ c0)= c1, c0 = ‚àÖ)
  3eqtr3d(c0, emptycls, (c2 \(c2 \ c0)), (c2 \ c1), (w0 ‚àß(c2 \ c0)= c1))
  difeq2d(c2, (c2 \ c0), c1, (w0 ‚àß(c2 \ c0)= c1))
  adantr(w0, (c2 \ c0)= c1, (c2 \(c2 \ c0))= c0)
  sylib(w0, (c2 \(c2 \ c0))= c0, c0 ‚äÜ c2)
  syl6sseqr(c0, c2, ‚ãÉ c3, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c3, c0 ‚àà c3)
  elssuni(c0, c3)
  dfss4(c0, c2)
  syl6eq((c2 \ c1), emptycls, (c2 \ c2), (w0 ‚àß(c2 \ c0)= c1))
  difeq2d(c2, c1, c2, (w0 ‚àß(c2 \ c0)= c1))
  connclo(c1, c2, c3, (w0 ‚àß(c2 \ c0)= c1))
  adantr(w0, (c2 \ c0)= c1, c3 ‚àà Conn)
  adantr(w0, (c2 \ c0)= c1, c1 ‚àà c3)
  adantr(w0, (c2 \ c0)= c1, c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  eqeltrrd(c1, (Clsd ` c3), (c2 \ c0), (w0 ‚àß(c2 \ c0)= c1))
  simpr(w0, (c2 \ c0)= c1)
  adantr(w0, (c2 \ c0)= c1, (c2 \ c0)‚àà(Clsd ` c3))
  syl2anc(w0, (c2 \ c0)‚àà(Clsd ` c3), c3 ‚àà Top, c0 ‚àà c3)
  syl(w0, c3 ‚àà Top, c3 ‚àà Conn)
  simplbi(c3 ‚àà Conn, c3 ‚àà Top, (c3 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c3))= { ‚àÖ, c2 })
  isconn(c3, c2)
  opncld(c3, c0, c2)
  difid(c2)
}

blocks.name: conntop
blocks.content: A connected topology is a topology. (Contributed by FL, 22-Dec-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: indisconn
blocks.content: The indiscrete topology (or trivial topology) on any set is connected. (Contributed by FL, 5-Jan-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: dfconn2
blocks.content: An alternate definition of connectedness. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 9-Jul-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfconn2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, cconn), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(w3a(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)), wne(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitr4d(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, cconn), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(w3a(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)), wne(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(w3a(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)), wne(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(c0))))))
  impbid2(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, cconn), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(w3a(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)), wne(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(c0))))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c0, c0, wcel(c0, cconn), wi(w3a(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)), wne(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(c0))))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cconn), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), w3a(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)), wne(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(c0)))
  conndisj(cv(s0), cv(s1), cuni(c0), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cconn), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), w3a(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cconn), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), w3a(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))
  simplrl(wcel(c0, cconn), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), w3a(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))
  simpr1(wa(wcel(c0, cconn), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))
  simplrr(wcel(c0, cconn), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), w3a(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))
  simpr2(wa(wcel(c0, cconn), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))
  simpr3(wa(wcel(c0, cconn), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wi(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(w3a(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)), wne(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(c0))))), wcel(c0, cconn)), wcel(c0, ctop))
  topontop(c0, c1)
  sylibrd(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(w3a(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)), wne(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(c0))))), wcel(c0, cconn), wss(cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0)), cpr(emptycls, cuni(c0))))

blocks.name: connsuba
blocks.content: Connectedness for a subspace. See ~ connsub . (Contributed by FL, 29-May-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm connsuba(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cconn), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(w3a(wne(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls), wne(cin(cv(s1), c2), emptycls), wceq(cin(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), emptycls)), wne(cin(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), c2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cconn), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(w3a(wne(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls), wne(cin(cv(s1), c2), emptycls), wceq(cin(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), emptycls)), wne(cin(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), c2)))), wral(hs0, co(c0, crest, c2), wral(hs1, co(c0, crest, c2), wi(w3a(wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wne(cv(hs1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), emptycls)), wne(cun(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c2)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cconn), wral(hs0, co(c0, crest, c2), wral(hs1, co(c0, crest, c2), wi(w3a(wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wne(cv(hs1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), emptycls)), wne(cun(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c2))))), wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cfv(ctopon, c2)))
  resttopon(c0, c1, c2)
  dfconn2(hs0, hs1, co(c0, crest, c2), c2)
  ralxfr2d(hs0, s0, co(c0, crest, c2), c0, cin(cv(s0), c2), universe, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wral(hs1, co(c0, crest, c2), wi(w3a(wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wne(cv(hs1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), emptycls)), wne(cun(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c2))), wral(s1, c0, wi(w3a(wne(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls), wne(cin(cv(s1), c2), emptycls), wceq(cin(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), emptycls)), wne(cin(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), c2))))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cin(cv(s0), c2), universe))
  inex1(cv(s0), c2)
  vex(s0)
  syldan(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, crest, c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(s0), c2)))), wcel(c2, universe))
  elrest(s0, c0, cfv(ctopon, c1), c2, universe, cv(hs0))
  ralxfr2d(hs1, s1, co(c0, crest, c2), c0, cin(cv(s1), c2), universe, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(s0), c2))), wi(w3a(wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wne(cv(hs1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), emptycls)), wne(cun(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c2)), wi(w3a(wne(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls), wne(cin(cv(s1), c2), emptycls), wceq(cin(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), emptycls)), wne(cin(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), c2)))
  a1i(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(s0), c2))), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cin(cv(s1), c2), universe))
  inex1(cv(s1), c2)
  vex(s1)
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(s0), c2)), wb(wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, crest, c2)), wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs1), cin(cv(s1), c2)))))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, crest, c2)), wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs1), cin(cv(s1), c2)))), wcel(c2, universe))
  ssexd(c2, c1, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c1, c0))
  toponmax(c0, c1)

  diff.wceq.s(s1, (hs0 ‚ãÇ hs1), emptycls)

blocks.name: connsub
blocks.content: Two equivalent ways of saying that a subspace topology is connected. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 9-Jul-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm connsub(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cconn), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(w3a(wne(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls), wne(cin(cv(s1), c2), emptycls), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdif(c1, c2))), wn(wss(c2, cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cconn), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(w3a(wne(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls), wne(cin(cv(s1), c2), emptycls), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdif(c1, c2))), wn(wss(c2, cun(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(w3a(wne(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls), wne(cin(cv(s1), c2), emptycls), wceq(cin(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), emptycls)), wne(cin(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), c2)))))
  connsuba(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  2ralbidva(s0, s1, c0, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wi(w3a(wne(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls), wne(cin(cv(s1), c2), emptycls), wceq(cin(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), emptycls)), wne(cin(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), c2)), wi(w3a(wne(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls), wne(cin(cv(s1), c2), emptycls), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdif(c1, c2))), wn(wss(c2, cun(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  imbi12d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), w3a(wne(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls), wne(cin(cv(s1), c2), emptycls), wceq(cin(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), emptycls)), wne(cin(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), c2), w3a(wne(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls), wne(cin(cv(s1), c2), emptycls), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdif(c1, c2))), wn(wss(c2, cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  3anbi3d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wne(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls), wne(cin(cv(s1), c2), emptycls), wceq(cin(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), emptycls), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdif(c1, c2)))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wb(wceq(cin(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), emptycls), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdif(c1, c2))), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))
  syl5ss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))))
  inss1(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  ad2ant2r(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1))
  toponss(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  reldisj(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1, c2)
  necon3abid(cin(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wss(c2, cun(cv(s0), cv(s1))))

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚Üí((c0[|`t]c2)‚àà Conn ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(((s0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß(s1 ‚ãÇ c2)‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚äÜ(c1 \ c2))‚Üí ¬¨ c2 ‚äÜ(s0 ‚ãÉ s1))))))

blocks.name: connsubclo
blocks.content: If a clopen set meets a connected subspace, it must contain the entire subspace. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm connsubclo(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c3))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(co(c3, crest, c0), cconn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wne(cin(c1, c0), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c3)))
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wss(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c1, c0), c0))
  eqtr4d(cin(c1, c0), c0, cuni(co(c3, crest, c0)), w0)
  connclo(cin(c1, c0), cuni(co(c3, crest, c0)), co(c3, crest, c0), w0)
  eqid(cuni(co(c3, crest, c0)))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(cin(c1, c0), co(c3, crest, c0)), wcel(c3, ctop), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, c3))
  ssexd(c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c3, ctop))
  topopn(c3, c2)
  elrestr(c3, ctop, c0, universe, c1)
  mpbird(w0, wcel(cin(c1, c0), cfv(ccld, co(c3, crest, c0))), wrex(hs0, cfv(ccld, c3), wceq(cin(c1, c0), cin(cv(hs0), c0))))
  sylancl(w0, wrex(hs0, cfv(ccld, c3), wceq(cin(c1, c0), cin(cv(hs0), c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c3)), wceq(cin(c1, c0), cin(c1, c0)))
  eqid(cin(c1, c0))
  rspceeqv(hs0, c1, cfv(ccld, c3), cin(c1, c0), cin(c1, c0), cin(cv(hs0), c0))
  ineq1(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(cin(c1, c0), cfv(ccld, co(c3, crest, c0))), wrex(hs0, cfv(ccld, c3), wceq(cin(c1, c0), cin(cv(hs0), c0)))), wcel(c3, ctop), wss(c0, c2))
  restcld(hs0, c3, c0, c2, cin(c1, c0))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(c0, cuni(co(c3, crest, c0))), wcel(c3, ctop), wss(c0, c2))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c3)))
  cldrcl(c1, c3)
  restuni(c3, c0, c2)
  sseqin2(c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ccld, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c1, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

  sylancl(w0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà(Clsd ` c3),(c1 ‚ãÇ c0)=(hs0 ‚ãÇ c0)), c1 ‚àà(Clsd ` c3), (c1 ‚ãÇ c0)=(c1 ‚ãÇ c0))
  eqid((c1 ‚ãÇ c0))

  restcld(hs0, c3, c0, c2, (c1 ‚ãÇ c0))

blocks.name: connima
blocks.content: The image of a connected set is connected. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jul-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm connima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, crest, cima(c1, c2)), cconn))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c4, ccn, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(co(c4, crest, c2), cconn))
} = {
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, crest, cima(c1, c2)), cconn), wcel(co(c4, crest, c2), cconn), wfo(cres(c1, c2), c2, cuni(co(c0, crest, cima(c1, c2)))), wcel(cres(c1, c2), co(co(c4, crest, c2), ccn, co(c0, crest, cima(c1, c2)))))
  mpbid(w0, wfo(cres(c1, c2), c2, cuni(co(c0, crest, cima(c1, c2)))), wfo(cres(c1, c2), c2, cima(c1, c2)))
  syl2anc(w0, wfo(cres(c1, c2), c2, cima(c1, c2)), wfun(c1), wss(c2, cdm(c1)))
  ffund(c1, c3, cuni(c0), w0)
  sseqtr4d(c2, cdm(c1), c3, w0)
  fdmd(c1, c3, cuni(c0), w0)
  fores(c1, c2)
  syl(w0, wb(wfo(cres(c1, c2), c2, cima(c1, c2)), wfo(cres(c1, c2), c2, cuni(co(c0, crest, cima(c1, c2))))), wceq(cima(c1, c2), cuni(co(c0, crest, cima(c1, c2)))))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cima(c1, c2), cuni(co(c0, crest, cima(c1, c2)))), wcel(c0, ctop), wss(cima(c1, c2), cuni(c0)))
  restuni(c0, cima(c1, c2), cuni(c0))
  foeq3(cima(c1, c2), cuni(co(c0, crest, cima(c1, c2))), cres(c1, c2), c2)
  mpbid(w0, wcel(cres(c1, c2), co(co(c4, crest, c2), ccn, co(c0, crest, cima(c1, c2)))), wcel(cres(c1, c2), co(co(c4, crest, c2), ccn, c0)))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cres(c1, c2), co(co(c4, crest, c2), ccn, c0)), wcel(c1, co(c4, ccn, c0)), wss(c2, c3))
  cnrest(c1, c4, c0, c2, c3)
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wcel(cres(c1, c2), co(co(c4, crest, c2), ccn, c0)), wcel(cres(c1, c2), co(co(c4, crest, c2), ccn, co(c0, crest, cima(c1, c2))))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wss(crn(cres(c1, c2)), cima(c1, c2)), wss(cima(c1, c2), cuni(c0)))
  sylib(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, co(c4, ccn, c0)))
  cntop2(c1, c4, c0)
  toptopon2(c0)
  mp1i(w0, wss(crn(cres(c1, c2)), cima(c1, c2)), wceq(cima(c1, c2), crn(cres(c1, c2))))
  df-ima(c1, c2)
  eqimss2(cima(c1, c2), crn(cres(c1, c2)))
  syl5ss(cima(c1, c2), cuni(c0), crn(c1), w0)
  imassrn(c1, c2)
  frnd(c1, cuni(c0), c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wf(c1, c3, cuni(c0)), wcel(c1, co(c4, ccn, c0)))
  cnf(c1, c4, c0, c3, cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  cnrest2(c0, cuni(c0), cres(c1, c2), cima(c1, c2), co(c4, crest, c2))
  cnconn(co(c4, crest, c2), cres(c1, c2), c2, cuni(co(c0, crest, cima(c1, c2))), co(c0, crest, cima(c1, c2)))
  eqid(cuni(co(c0, crest, cima(c1, c2))))

  eqid(‚ãÉ c0)
  cnrest2(c0, ‚ãÉ c0, (c1 |` c2), (c1 " c2), (c4[|`t]c2))
  cnconn((c4[|`t]c2), (c1 |` c2), c2, ‚ãÉ(c0[|`t](c1 " c2)), (c0[|`t](c1 " c2)))
  eqid(‚ãÉ(c0[|`t](c1 " c2)))
}

blocks.name: conncn
blocks.content: A continuous function from a connected topology with one point in a clopen set must lie entirely within the set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm conncn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cconn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, ccn, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c5), c2))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wf(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), c2))
  connsubclo(crn(c0), c2, cuni(c4), c4, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c4, crest, crn(c0)), cconn), wcel(c3, cconn), wfo(c0, c1, cuni(co(c4, crest, crn(c0)))), wcel(c0, co(c3, ccn, co(c4, crest, crn(c0)))))
  mpbid(w0, wfo(c0, c1, cuni(co(c4, crest, crn(c0)))), wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0)))
  sylib(w0, wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0)), wfn(c0, c1))
  dffn4(c0, c1)
  syl(w0, wb(wfo(c0, c1, crn(c0)), wfo(c0, c1, cuni(co(c4, crest, crn(c0))))), wceq(crn(c0), cuni(co(c4, crest, crn(c0)))))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(crn(c0), cuni(co(c4, crest, crn(c0)))), wcel(c4, ctop), wss(crn(c0), cuni(c4)))
  restuni(c4, crn(c0), cuni(c4))
  foeq3(crn(c0), cuni(co(c4, crest, crn(c0))), c0, c1)
  mpbid(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, ccn, co(c4, crest, crn(c0)))), wcel(c0, co(c3, ccn, c4)))
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c3, ccn, c4)), wcel(c0, co(c3, ccn, co(c4, crest, crn(c0))))), wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c4))), wss(crn(c0), crn(c0)), wss(crn(c0), cuni(c4)))
  sylib(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c4))), wcel(c4, ctop))
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, ctop), wcel(c0, co(c3, ccn, c4)))
  cntop2(c0, c3, c4)
  toptopon2(c4)
  ssidd(crn(c0), w0)
  frnd(c0, cuni(c4), c1, w0)
  cnrest2(c4, cuni(c4), c0, crn(c0), c3)
  cnconn(c3, c0, c1, cuni(co(c4, crest, crn(c0))), co(c4, crest, crn(c0)))
  eqid(cuni(co(c4, crest, crn(c0))))
  syl2anc(w0, wne(cin(c2, crn(c0)), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c0, c5), c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c5), crn(c0)))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c5), crn(c0)), wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c5, c1))
  ffnd(c0, c1, cuni(c4), w0)
  syl(w0, wf(c0, c1, cuni(c4)), wcel(c0, co(c3, ccn, c4)))
  cnf(c0, c3, c4, c1, cuni(c4))
  eqid(cuni(c4))
  fnfvelrn(c0, c1, c5)
  inelcm(cfv(c0, c5), c2, crn(c0))
  df-f(c0, c1, c2)
}

thm conncn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2))
  ‚ä£ c1 = ‚ãÉ c3
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà Conn)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c5)‚àà c2)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), c0[Fn]c1, ran(c0)‚äÜ c2)

  syl2anc(w0, ran(c0)= ‚ãÉ(c4[|`t]ran(c0)), c4 ‚àà Top, ran(c0)‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c4)

  mpbid(w0, c0 ‚àà(c3[Cn](c4[|`t]ran(c0))), c0 ‚àà(c3[Cn]c4))
  syl3anc(w0, (c0 ‚àà(c3[Cn]c4)‚Üî c0 ‚àà(c3[Cn](c4[|`t]ran(c0)))), c4 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ c4), ran(c0)‚äÜ ran(c0), ran(c0)‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c4)
  sylib(w0, c4 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ c4), c4 ‚àà Top)
  syl(w0, c4 ‚àà Top, c0 ‚àà(c3[Cn]c4))
  cntop2(c0, c3, c4)
  toptopon2(c4)

  frnd(c0, ‚ãÉ c4, c1, w0)

  cnconn(c3, c0, c1, ‚ãÉ(c4[|`t]ran(c0)), (c4[|`t]ran(c0)))
  eqid(‚ãÉ(c4[|`t]ran(c0)))
  syl2anc(w0, (c2 ‚ãÇ ran(c0))‚â† ‚àÖ, (c0 ` c5)‚àà c2, (c0 ` c5)‚àà ran(c0))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` c5)‚àà ran(c0), c0[Fn]c1, c5 ‚àà c1)
  ffnd(c0, c1, ‚ãÉ c4, w0)

  eqid(‚ãÉ c4)

thm iunconnlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, c1)))

  eliun(s0, cv(hs0), c4, c5)

  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(co(c2, crest, c5), cconn))
  expr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(co(c2, crest, c5), cconn)))
  nconnsubb(c2, c5, c3, c1, c6, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(c0, c1))))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(c0, c1)), wss(c5, c3))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(c6, c2))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(c0, c1))), wne(cin(c1, c5), emptycls), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c5))

  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(c0, c1)), wss(cin(c1, c6), cdif(c3, ciun(s0, c4, c5))))
  sscond(c3, ciun(s0, c4, c5), c5, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(c0, c1))))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(c0, c1))), wb(wceq(cin(cin(c1, c6), c5), emptycls), wss(cin(c1, c6), cdif(c3, c5))), wss(cin(c1, c6), c3))
  syl5ss(cin(c1, c6), c3, c1, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(c0, c1))))
  inss1(c1, c6)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(c0, c1))), wss(c1, c3), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c1, c2))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, c2))

  ad2antlr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(c0, c1)), wss(c5, ciun(s0, c4, c5)))
  ssiun2(s0, c4, c5)
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(c0, c1)), wss(ciun(s0, c4, c5), cun(c1, c6)))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c6, ciun(s0, c4, c5)))

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

thm iunconnlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c4)‚Üí c5 ‚äÜ c3)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c4)‚Üí c0 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c4)‚Üí(c2[|`t]c5)‚àà Conn)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c6 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c6 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c4, c5))‚â† ‚àÖ)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 ‚ãÇ c6)‚äÜ(c3 \ ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c4, c5)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c4, c5)‚äÜ(c1 ‚ãÉ c6))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)

} = {

  sylib(w0, ‚àÉ(hs0, hs0 ‚àà(c6 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c4, c5))), (c6 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c4, c5))‚â† ‚àÖ)
  n0(hs0, (c6 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c4, c5)))
  exlimdv(hs0, w0, hs0 ‚àà(c6 ‚ãÇ ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c4, c5)), ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1)

  elin(hs0, c6, ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c4, c5))
  expimpd(w0, hs0 ‚àà c6, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c4, c5), ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1)
  syl5bi((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c6), hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c4, c5), ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c4, hs0 ‚àà c5))
  eliun(s0, hs0, c4, c5)
  rexlimd(s0, c4, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c6), hs0 ‚àà c5, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1)
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ‚àà c6)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ‚àà c6)
  nfv(s0, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1)
  exp32((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c6), s0 ‚àà c4, hs0 ‚àà c5, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1)
  an4s(w0, hs0 ‚àà c6, s0 ‚àà c4, hs0 ‚àà c5, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1)

  adantr((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c4), (hs0 ‚àà c6 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c5), (c2[|`t]c5)‚àà Conn)
  expr((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c4), (hs0 ‚àà c6 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c5), c0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨(c2[|`t]c5)‚àà Conn)
  nconnsubb(c2, c5, c3, c1, c6, ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c4)‚àß((hs0 ‚àà c6 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c5)‚àß c0 ‚àà c1)))
  adantr((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c4), ((hs0 ‚àà c6 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c5)‚àß c0 ‚àà c1), c5 ‚äÜ c3)

  syl2anc(((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c4)‚àß((hs0 ‚àà c6 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c5)‚àß c0 ‚àà c1)), (c1 ‚ãÇ c5)‚â† ‚àÖ, c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c5)

blocks.name: iunconn
blocks.content: The indexed union of connected overlapping subspaces sharing a common point is connected. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: clsconn
blocks.content: The closure of a connected set is connected. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2015.)

thm conncompid(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  syl6eleqr(c2, c3, cuni(crab(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cconn)))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, cuni(crab(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cconn))))), wrex(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cconn)))))

  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(csn(c2), cpw(c1)), wss(csn(c2), c1))
  snssd(c2, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)))

  rspcev(s0, csn(c2), cpw(c1), wa(wcel(c2, csn(c2)), wa(wcel(c2, csn(c2)), wcel(co(c0, crest, csn(c2)), cconn))), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cconn))))

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(ccld, c0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c3), c3))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c3), c3), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c3), c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c3)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c3)), cconn))
  sseqtr4d(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c3), c1, cuni(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)))
  syl2an2r(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c3), cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c3, cuni(c0)))
  clsss3(c0, c3, cuni(c0))
  sseldd(c2, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c3), c3, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)))
  syl2an2r(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wss(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c3)), wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c3, cuni(c0)))
  sscls(c0, c3, cuni(c0))
  conncompid(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c3)), cconn), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c3, c1), wcel(co(c0, crest, c3), cconn))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wss(c3, c1))
  conncompconn(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  clsconn(c0, c1, c3)
  conncompss(s0, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c3), c1, c2, c0, c3)
  syl2an2r(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(ccld, c0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c3), c3)), wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c3, cuni(c0)))
  topontop(c0, c1)
  syl5sseq(c3, cuni(c0), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)))
  eqsstri(c3, c1, cuni(crab(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cconn)))))
  mpbi(wss(cuni(crab(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cconn)))), c1), wss(crab(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cconn))), cpw(c1)))
  ssrab2(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cconn)))
  sspwuni(crab(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cconn))), c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wceq(c1, cuni(c0)))
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  iscld4(c0, c3, cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm conncompcld(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí c3 ‚àà(Clsd ` c0))
  ‚ä£ c3 = ‚ãÉ { s0 ‚àà P(c1)|(c2 ‚àà s0 ‚àß(c0[|`t]s0)‚àà Conn)}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpbird((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), c3 ‚àà(Clsd ` c0), ((cls ` c0)` c3)‚äÜ c3)
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), ((cls ` c0)` c3)‚äÜ c3, ((cls ` c0)` c3)‚äÜ c1, c2 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` c3), (c0[|`t]((cls ` c0)` c3))‚àà Conn)
  sseqtr4d(((cls ` c0)` c3), c1, ‚ãÉ c0, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c1))
  syl2an2r(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà c1, ((cls ` c0)` c3)‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0, c0 ‚àà Top, c3 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0)
  clsss3(c0, c3, ‚ãÉ c0)
  sseldd(c2, ((cls ` c0)` c3), c3, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c1))
  syl2an2r(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚äÜ((cls ` c0)` c3), c0 ‚àà Top, c3 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0)
  sscls(c0, c3, ‚ãÉ c0)
  conncompid(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), (c0[|`t]((cls ` c0)` c3))‚àà Conn, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c3 ‚äÜ c1, (c0[|`t]c3)‚àà Conn)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà c1)
  a1i((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), c3 ‚äÜ c1)
  conncompconn(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  clsconn(c0, c1, c3)
  conncompss(s0, ((cls ` c0)` c3), c1, c2, c0, c3)
  syl2an2r(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà c1, (c3 ‚àà(Clsd ` c0)‚Üî((cls ` c0)` c3)‚äÜ c3), c0 ‚àà Top, c3 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0)
  topontop(c0, c1)
  syl5sseq(c3, ‚ãÉ c0, c1, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c1))
  eqsstri(c3, c1, ‚ãÉ { s0 ‚àà P(c1)|(c2 ‚àà s0 ‚àß(c0[|`t]s0)‚àà Conn)})
  mpbi(‚ãÉ { s0 ‚àà P(c1)|(c2 ‚àà s0 ‚àß(c0[|`t]s0)‚àà Conn)} ‚äÜ c1, { s0 ‚àà P(c1)|(c2 ‚àà s0 ‚àß(c0[|`t]s0)‚àà Conn)} ‚äÜ P(c1))
  ssrab2(s0, P(c1), (c2 ‚àà s0 ‚àß(c0[|`t]s0)‚àà Conn))
  sspwuni({ s0 ‚àà P(c1)|(c2 ‚àà s0 ‚àß(c0[|`t]s0)‚àà Conn)}, c1)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà c1, c1 = ‚ãÉ c0)
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  iscld4(c0, c3, ‚ãÉ c0)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c0)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
}

blocks.name: conncompclo
blocks.content: The connected component containing ` A ` is a subset of any clopen set containing ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm conncompclo(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)), wss(c4, c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cuni(crab(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cconn)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  connsubclo(c4, c2, cuni(c0), c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)), wss(c4, cuni(c0)), wcel(c4, cfv(ccld, c0)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, cfv(ccld, c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c3, c1))
  conncompcld(s0, c0, c1, c3, c4)
  cldss(c4, c0, cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c4), cconn), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c3, c1))
  conncompconn(s0, c0, c1, c3, c4)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)), wne(cin(c2, c4), emptycls), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c3, c4))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c3, c1))
  sseldd(c3, c1, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(c3, c2))
  elin1d(c2, c0, cfv(ccld, c0), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)))
  toponss(c0, c1, c2)
  simp3(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(c3, c2))
  conncompid(s0, c0, c1, c3, c4)
  inelcm(c3, c2, c4)
  elin2d(c2, cfv(ccld, c0), c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cin(c0, cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(c3, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm conncompclo(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí c4 ‚äÜ c2)
  ‚ä£ c4 = ‚ãÉ { s0 ‚àà P(c1)|(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚àß(c0[|`t]s0)‚àà Conn)}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  connsubclo(c4, c2, ‚ãÉ c0, c0, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  syl((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), c4 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0, c4 ‚àà(Clsd ` c0))
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), c4 ‚àà(Clsd ` c0), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c3 ‚àà c1)
  conncompcld(s0, c0, c1, c3, c4)
  cldss(c4, c0, ‚ãÉ c0)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c0)
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (c0[|`t]c4)‚àà Conn, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c3 ‚àà c1)
  conncompconn(s0, c0, c1, c3, c4)
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (c2 ‚ãÇ c4)‚â† ‚àÖ, c3 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c4)
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), c3 ‚àà c4, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c3 ‚àà c1)
  sseldd(c3, c1, c2, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), c2 ‚äÜ c1, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0)
  simp1(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0)), c3 ‚àà c2)
  elin1d(c2, c0, (Clsd ` c0), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  toponss(c0, c1, c2)
  simp3(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0)), c3 ‚àà c2)
  conncompid(s0, c0, c1, c3, c4)
  inelcm(c3, c2, c4)
  elin2d(c2, (Clsd ` c0), c0, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0))‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  simp2(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(Clsd ` c0)), c3 ‚àà c2)
}

blocks.name: t1connperf
blocks.content: A connected T_1 space is perfect, unless it is the topology of a singleton. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm t1connperf(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, cconn), wn(wbr(c1, cen, c1o))), wcel(c0, cperf))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, cconn), wn(wbr(c1, cen, c1o)), wcel(c0, cperf))
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, cconn)), wn(wbr(c1, cen, c1o)), wcel(c0, cperf), wral(hs0, c1, wn(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0))))
  syl6ibr(wa(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, cconn)), wn(wbr(c1, cen, c1o)), wral(hs0, c1, wn(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0))), wn(wrex(hs0, c1, wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0))))
  con3d(wa(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, cconn)), wbr(c1, cen, c1o), wrex(hs0, c1, wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0)))
  rexlimdvaa(hs0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, cconn)), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0), wbr(c1, cen, c1o))
  syl6eqbrr(c1, cen, c1o, csn(cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, cconn)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0))))
  connclo(csn(cv(hs0)), c1, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, cconn)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, cconn), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0)))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, cconn)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, cconn)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0))), wne(csn(cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  snnz(cv(hs0))
  ad2ant2r(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, cconn), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccld, c0)))
  t1sncld(c0, cv(hs0), c1)
  ensn1(cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  ralnex(hs0, c1, wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, cconn)), wb(wcel(c0, cperf), wral(hs0, c1, wn(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0)))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, cconn), wcel(c0, ctop))
  t1top(c0)
  baib(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c0, cperf), wral(hs0, c1, wn(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0))))
  isperf3(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, cconn)))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c1, cen, c1o))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Fre ‚àß c0 ‚àà Conn ‚àß ¬¨ c1[‚âÖ]1o)‚Üí c0 ‚àà Perf)
  ‚ä£ c1 = ‚ãÉ c0
} = {
  3impia(c0 ‚àà Fre, c0 ‚àà Conn, ¬¨ c1[‚âÖ]1o, c0 ‚àà Perf)
  sylibrd((c0 ‚àà Fre ‚àß c0 ‚àà Conn), ¬¨ c1[‚âÖ]1o, c0 ‚àà Perf, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ { hs0 } ‚àà c0))
  syl6ibr((c0 ‚àà Fre ‚àß c0 ‚àà Conn), ¬¨ c1[‚âÖ]1o, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ { hs0 } ‚àà c0), ¬¨ ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, { hs0 } ‚àà c0))
  con3d((c0 ‚àà Fre ‚àß c0 ‚àà Conn), c1[‚âÖ]1o, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, { hs0 } ‚àà c0))
  rexlimdvaa(hs0, c1, (c0 ‚àà Fre ‚àß c0 ‚àà Conn), { hs0 } ‚àà c0, c1[‚âÖ]1o)
  syl6eqbrr(c1, cen, c1o, { hs0 }, ((c0 ‚àà Fre ‚àß c0 ‚àà Conn)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß { hs0 } ‚àà c0)))
  connclo({ hs0 }, c1, c0, ((c0 ‚àà Fre ‚àß c0 ‚àà Conn)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß { hs0 } ‚àà c0)))
  simplr(c0 ‚àà Fre, c0 ‚àà Conn, (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß { hs0 } ‚àà c0))
  simprr((c0 ‚àà Fre ‚àß c0 ‚àà Conn), hs0 ‚àà c1, { hs0 } ‚àà c0)
  a1i(((c0 ‚àà Fre ‚àß c0 ‚àà Conn)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß { hs0 } ‚àà c0)), { hs0 } ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  snnz(hs0)
  ad2ant2r(c0 ‚àà Fre, c0 ‚àà Conn, hs0 ‚àà c1, { hs0 } ‚àà c0, { hs0 } ‚àà(Clsd ` c0))
  t1sncld(c0, hs0, c1)
  ensn1(hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  ralnex(hs0, c1, { hs0 } ‚àà c0)
  syl((c0 ‚àà Fre ‚àß c0 ‚àà Conn), (c0 ‚àà Perf ‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ { hs0 } ‚àà c0)), c0 ‚àà Top)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà Fre, c0 ‚àà Conn, c0 ‚àà Top)
  t1top(c0)
  baib(c0 ‚àà Top, c0 ‚àà Perf, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ { hs0 } ‚àà c0))
  isperf3(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà Fre ‚àß c0 ‚àà Conn))
  diff.hs0.w(c1[‚âÖ]1o)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
